gameDetails.name: Four Battles of the Ancient World
gameDetails.description:
Includes:

     Arbela - Alexander vs. Darius
     Cannae - Roman Consul Varro vs. Hannibal
     Pharsalus - Julius Caesar vs. Pompey
     Teutoburger Wald - Roman Govenor Varus vs. Germanic Tribes


Each battle has its own scenario, map and 100 counters. Introductory, Basic and Advanced Rules.


Also available as a box set with other volumes:

    Battles of the Ancient World Volume II
    Battles of the Ancient World Volume III
